issue.title: [Java] Support comparison & sort for more numeric types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5844](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5844). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, we only support comparison & sort for 32-bit integers, in this issue, we provide support for more numeric data types:
- byte
- short
- long
- float
- double
